title: Petrol prices fall to a four - year low - but drivers might want to fill up sooner rather than later after Trump threat to attack Iran
description: A litre of petrol at UK forecourts has fallen to an average of 131.91p in recent days, the RAC said. The last time the fuel was cheaper was in July 2021, when it averaged 131.81p per litre.
